phrases: You are the one that I like...
You do not have to give me an answer right away.
I just wanted to let you know...
I am going to come back in here with a cool improv riff.
It do not mean a thing if you do not actually play.
Looks like you are having a good time, Sen-boy.
Actually, I already mentioned this to Ri-chan's dad,
but I have got some good news...
Would you cats be up for playing jazz in front of an audience?
The bar I worked at here asked us to do a Christmas performance for'them.
It is a gaijin bar for YOU.S. troops stationed here, so if we are going to do this,
we would better put some spunk into it.
Want To give it a shot?
We got just one month before Christmas, so that does not leave us much time!
Is not your birthday on Christmas?
We would better do a decent performance.
It is been a while, so for starters, let us try playing together.
This will be our first session as a quartet since summer vacation!
Come on, Richie, are not you going to play?
Once in a while, this guy just freezes up.
Kaoru-kun's got a classical background, so maybe he is shooting for perfection.
Do not think you need to do anything complicated at first.
All you really have to do is hit the keys.
That is plenty lively for an improvisation.
Remember how it felt when you jumped in and went wild
when we played during summer vacation.
Never thought I would meet Bill Evans in a place like this!
Now I think we can expect you to play great!
By the way, what were you doing the other day with Yurika-san?
In the back of the art room.
So are you two already, uh... having that kind of relationship?
You cannot tell me nothing happened when you were dressed like that!
She just asked me to model for her painting.
I did not get what it was about, but it was over before I knew it.
Come to think of it, she told me to be her model every week from now on.
Sounds like there is hope for you yet.
What will you do next time...
What the hell do you think you are doing?!
Hey, who is that Nishimi guy, really?
I heard your nephew got the top score in the final exam...
And he is not just a prodigy, he can play the piano, too!
Yes, well, I do not like how he has not been getting home'til late these days...
After all, he is the only male heir in the Nishimi family.
I have to make sure he maintains his grades
so he can go to medical school or the like.
Even though I am surrounded by people...
Is not your birthday on Christmas?
I do not see him buying a new pair for himself...
Maybe I will get them for him, one jazz musician to another...
It looks like we both had the same idea.
We will each buy one stick and give them to him as a pair.
Maybe it is okay if things stay this way?
I wonder what Ri-chan thinks of me...
Winter in Kyushu is pretty cold.
I would not be surprised if it started to snow.
Oh, it is not that cold!
It rarely snows here in December.
You are going to pay for that!
How dare you make Ri'ko cry?!
It is Richie, from when we had watermelon!
Oh, what are you doing here?
He is the last person I wanted to see right now.
Alright, how'bout we all race home?
The winner gets to have the biggest piece of cake!
You want to join us for cake too, Richie?
Oh yeah, your family is rich.
Bet you have a fancy cake waitin' for you at home.
Somebody who takes being surrounded with a loving family for granted
will never understand that there are people who live in a house
but have no place in it!
Because he has the thing I wish for more than anything, but can never have?
Your family's waiting for you, are not they?!
When I am around you, it only makes me feel more miserable!
These are some really nice sticks.
I just laid out half the money for them.
Oh, so one's from Ri'ko and one's from you, huh?
Why is that kid next to Ri-chan in all the photos?
It is easy to tell when you see me as a little kid, right?
Richie, I am one of those that are not got a place in the house, too.
Are not Yasuko's things in that box?!
I do not care, she is no daughter of mine!
Seducing an enemy soldier, bearing his child, and in the end,
abandoning her shame here before running away!
I do not remember giving birth to a daughter like that!
So you did not see anything either, huh, kid?
Sentaro, this is apparently a memento
your mother left behind when she went away.
Sentaro, the rosary is not a necklace.
You are always wearin' this thing.
Let me borrow it a minute.
Kawabuchi, the kid who went nuts yesterday...
You will not have any friends left if you keep getting into fights!
I did not have any to begin with.
My dad lost his job around then and stayed home gettin' drunk every day.
Could not even look me in the eye no more.
Eventually, though, he found a job in another prefecture,
said he was going to live an' work there for a while.
I thought it was my fault...
He is still workin' there now, has not come back home in all these years.
It is fun at home, never a dull moment,
but once in a while, I start thinkin'...
I was so convinced this guy had it all...
Those things I yelled at him...
It is like we are children playing around on an organ...
Maybe even every day,'til our gig...
We got to knock the socks off them Americans!
This is the guy that Ri-chan loves...
My love feels so petty in comparison...
Since then, we put our all into every day's session.
Time flew and before we knew it, the day had come...
Foreign soldiers gather to drink here.
It is no place for a young lady like you.
I have come to listen to jazz.
I was invited by a friend.
It feels like you are mocking me.
Alright, just play like we practiced at first,
but feel free to go crazy with it once you get in the groove.
Let us hang loose and have fun.
Ladies and gentlemen, this is the Mukae Tsutomu Quartet.
I cannot stand that coon music jazz!
It sounds like a jumble of noise!
He says he does not like black jazz, so we should play white jazz.
What kind of segregation is that?!
What are you tryin' to say, old man?!
You cannot get through to a drunk like that.
Can you play that one song?
At this rate, the party's going to end on a sour note.
But maybe we can at least lighten up the mood.
It will just be like we are playing for fun.
They are writing songs of love, but not for me.
A lucky star's above, but not for me.
With love to lead the way,
I have found more clouds of gray
than any Russian play could guarantee.
I can understand why Sentaro gets so excited every time he comes back to town.
It is only natural to admire him...
Anyway, Brother Jun really surprised me!
You are the hero of the night, Brother Jun!
Oh, Brother Jun, pretending you do not know what I am talking about!
Thanks to that jerk cuttin' in,
I did not get to play even half of what we practiced!
But it was a good experience.
The unexpected is really what makes jazz fun, is not it?
Listen to you, soundin' off like an expert!
and goes in an unexpected direction...
